about.1: Hey! I’m Mack! I’m a software engineer on Branch Metrics’ platform engineering team. I recently graduated from the University of Waterloo, and throughout my degree I had five internships in various fields, roles, and cities across North America.
about.2: I love the fast pace, complexity, and freedom of software engineering, and I’m most interested in building reliable distributed systems and microservices in Java, JavaScript, Go, and Python, with tools such as Kubernetes, Kafka, and AWS. I’m a skilled communicator, leader, organizer, and project manager. I have a creative side, too, and I enjoy UI/UX design, photography, theatre, and music. I also get involved in community events and inclusivity initiatives whenever I have the chance, and I play competitive rugby.
about.3: Scroll to learn more about me, and click each entry to expand it. Feel free to use the buttons above to connect with me or see my resume, as well!

contact: I'd love to get in touch! Use the links below to shoot me an email, or see my resume and LinkedIn. Can't wait to hear from you!
